objects.text: Natural Pain Relief Solution by Blue Ridge Hemp Co.

product_details.name: Premium Blue Ridge CBD-Infused Gel | Natural Pain Relief Solution
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade CBD-infused therapeutic gel formula
• 2oz (60ml) convenient size for regular use
• Multiple varieties available for different therapeutic needs
• Fast-absorbing gel formulation for targeted relief
• Made by trusted Blue Ridge Hemp Co.
• Lab-tested for quality and purity
• All-natural ingredients blend
• Easy-to-use applicator design
• Travel-friendly packaging
• Non-greasy formula that dries quickly
• Perfect for topical application
• Made in USA with premium hemp extracts

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a health-focused advertisement for a product presented in a clear, eye-catching layout. The background is a graceful blend of teal and indigo hues with abstract wave and circle accents, overlaid with soft linear gradients that give a sense of flow and calm. The composition includes a prominent heading ("heading") and subheading ("subheading") that establish the premium nature and benefits of the product. Centered beneath is a product image ("product_image") — a trio of colorful tubes arranged diagonally, adding visual emphasis. Supporting text elements ("tagline" and "description") communicate benefits and details in a clean format. The pricing ("price") is bold and inviting, with a rectangular button ("cta_button") and its label ("cta") strategically placed for conversion.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Green (#004d40)
- Indigo Blue (#1a237e)
- Aqua Blue (#b2dfdb)
- Mint Green (#4db6ac)
- White (#ffffff)
- Deep Teal (#004d40 with lower opacity for text shadows and accents)
product_color: The product image showcases three CBD roll-ons featuring a sophisticated color palette of earthy tones that evoke calmness, wellness, and natural healing. Each bottle uses a solid background color—burnt orange (#C34F30), teal green (#4B8371), and mustard yellow (#D3A23F)—which are intentionally saturated to create both distinction and harmony. These warm, grounded hues subtly contrast with sleek black caps (#1E1E1E) to highlight the usability and premium quality. White text (#F4F4F4) adds sharp legibility while maintaining a clean aesthetic. The gradient blue-to-red circle icon (#355D82 to #BD4A4A) ties all elements together. This palette can effectively evoke trust and vitality in an advertisement banner.
